org.cytoscape.model
Interface CyNetwork

All Superinterfaces:
CyModelObject
public interface CyNetwork
extends CyModelObject

A CyNetwork is a collection of nodes and the edges that connect them. CyNetworks also maintains information about the selection state of nodes and edges.
